string.text: Mercenary, this is Orest, the leader of local stalkers. If you want to talk, find me on the first floor of the main building.
Hey you! No strangers allowed, this is our turf! Will fire without warning!
Heh! Now we’ll give ’em hell for sure!
Whew..! It should be easier from here.
Thanks, buddy! Now we’ll knock ’em out cold!
Oh man, you really bailed us out there! Swing by the base some time for a reward.
Thanks, dude! Stop by our base and we’ll show you our gratitude!
A million thanks! Next time you’re in our neck of the woods, drop by our base for a reward!
That’ll teach them to stay away from places they aren’t invited to!
We held them off, thank God!
The only loot they got out of this camp is a few bullets in their heads!
We’re getting squeezed by bandits! Help us out, man, please!
We’re at war with those Clear Sky bastards! Help us out and we’ll pay you back!
Duty are going crazy on our asses! Help us out, or we’re dead meat!
Hey, stalker! We’re getting pounded by Freedom! What do you say we teach ’em a lesson together?
Help, man! The army’s beating up on fellow stalkers!
We’re knee-deep in monsters, man! Help!
Dude! You gotta help us kill these zombies!
They’re killing our guys! Where are you?!
We can’t hold them! Hurry!
Soon it’s gonna be too late! Help us!
… What happened? Come in. Do you read me?
… Guys, what’s going on there?
… Anyone alive? Respond!
… Can you hear me? This is…
Our squad ain’t responding. Go to them, they might need help.
We can’t establish communication with our lads. Gotta check out what’s up.
Our fellas got lost someplace. Get a team ready and go find them.
Let’s go and see what’s up.
Roger! We’re already on our way!
I bet they’re doing just fine. But sure, we’ll check it out.
It’s game over for you, chicken-shits!
Cover me, boys, I’m going in!
Someone’s gonna get hurt!
Everyone ready? Move out!
C’mon, it’s time to go and be heroes.
Get ready! Move it, people!
Get ready for action! Everyone, spread out!
Spread out, boys! We’re moving out!
Spread out and get in position!
Aww, I was just about to take a nap…
What?! No, not again!
I shoulda just died at birth…
Will ya ever friggin’ let me finish a meal?
They told me to stay away from the Zone…
What, that’s it? I was just getting warmed up.
Whew, time to relax your sphincter! It’s all over!
We’re the best, guys! We showed them!
We’re about to have a party. Who’s up for some fun?
Enemy encountered. We’re about to start!
We see the enemy. Getting ready for action…
Remember, everybody: fire on my command!
Get ready. Fire on my signal!
Less initiative! Wait for my signal!
Just as we began to miss them… I see the enemy!
Enemy right next to us!
I see them!
We’ve taken the position!
Position captured.
Everything’s under control. Location captured.
Go stalkers! Take ’em down!
Shoot them!
Fire! FIRE!!!
Hey buddy, still remember us?
Hey, where are you? We’re waiting…
We’re still here, if anyone cares.
It ain’t gonna end that easily! I’m tellin’ ya.
Keep your eyes open, the enemy may be here any minute!
It could be nothing… But check your weapons just in case.
We’re ready - will attack on your command!
We’re all ready. Just waiting for your order!
All positions are ready, waiting on your command!
Looks like they saw us!
That’s it, it’s no use hiding anymore.
A sneak attack is no longer an option.
On the double!
Shut up!
No one falls back!
… Report! Over…
… Is anyone there? Respond, over!
… What the… Come in, damn you!
… Dammit, have you all gone deaf or what?
Listen up! We’ve lost contact with our squad. We must find out what happened.
Go there and check what’s going on. The squad’s not responding.
Quick, get a team together and go see what’s going on! We’ve lost contact somehow. Be on your guard at all times!
Aye, aye, sir! Search the area and establish contact!
Yes, sir! Moving out immediately!
Roger! Assemble a search party!
That’s enough rest! We’re moving out!
Get yourself together! We’re moving out!
Squad, break into file!
Attention! Spread out!
Squad! Take your starting positions!
Spread out!
Dammit, not again… I’ve still got blood all over me from the last attack…
I’m sick and tired of these bozos.
That’s it, now I’m angry!
And so the fight goes on… Cra-a-a-ptastic!
This is getting to be way past annoying.
Fire!
Attack!
Go, you lousy bastards!
All riiight! That’s real kind of you, you know that?
Damn glad to see you!
Good to see you, man! We’ll show them a real good time now that you’re here!
Oh, brother! You really stuck up for us there! Come to our base - we’ll thank you properly and maybe unwind a little, too.
If it weren’t for you, we’d be wormfood by now. Pay us a visit at our base - we’ll reward you with a little something-something.
We came this close to ultimate freedom from this world. Stop by our base - we owe you one.
Those who live by the AK, die by the AK. Got that, Duty?
I didn’t quite get what they were trying to tell us.
The poor bastards didn’t have a chance - our tactics were just too good for them.
Brother! The bandits are getting to us - we need your help!
We need your support, buddy! These damn snowmen are about to smother us.
Help, dude! Duty is coming to collect!
Dude, help us pump some jarheads full of lead!
Hey stalker! We got a wild zoo here! We won’t make it without you!
Hey, bro, some stalkers are trying to take away our freedom! Help!
Dude, help us stop these zombies!
My friends are dying! Quick, help!
Heeeelp! We’re losing!
You forget about us?! We’re dying here!
… What the hell? What’s going on there?
… This ain’t funny no more… I ain’t kidding…
… Guys, what’s happening?
… Squad, come in… Shit!
Our guys ain’t coming in! Comb the area, and stay alert!
I’ll be damned if I know what’s going on. We have to go and see if our guys are alright.
I’m worried about our guys. Get a squad ready and search the area!
Yeah, we need to go see how our guys are doing.
We’re going, we’re going.
Ack! I hope they’re not in any serious trouble!
Come get an extra helping of lead!
Feel the love, douchebag!
I’ve had enough of you!
Everyone get ready! We’ve got a job to do!
Smoke break is over! Move your asses!
That’s enough suntan for you! Let’s rock and roll!
Break it up - keep your distances when attacking.
Scatter! Everyone at the ready!
Get in position, now!
Shit! Looks like I’m out of ammo…
Where to again?
Same shit, different day.
Ha-ha-ha!! You don’t… Hey, you’re not kidding?
Can’t we wait another hour or two?
That’s what happens to those who mess with Freedom.
You realized who you’re dealing with, huh? Don’t forget to tell your friends!
Done and done!
There’s the enemy! Get ready to attack!
The enemy is here! Join the attack - if you’re brave enough.
I see the enemy! Time to play some wargames…
Who’s the trigger-happy bastard? Fire on my command only!
Sit tight! Fire on my signal!
Wait for my command! Take aim!
There they are!
There’s contact! Get ready!
Enemy forces detected!
We took them all out. The position is ours.
The enemy is dead, we’ve got the location secured.
Our squad has captured the position.
Go, go, go!
Kill them all! Go!
Attack! Shoot, shoot!
Yo, dude, you with us or what?
You having fun all by yourself? What are we waiting for?
Just tell me one thing - are we free to go or you’re just being slow?
My gut’s telling me someone’s knocking on our door!
No sleeping! They’re about to come at us, I’d bet on it!
Attention! The enemy could be sneaking up on you as we speak!
My people are ready. We’ll join the fight on your signal!
Everything is basically ready - we’re just waiting for your command to attack.
We’ve assumed our positions. Waiting on your command!
Forget the element of surprise - we goofed it up!
It was a nice plan, but they nicked us!
No use hiding - we’ve been discovered!
Finally! What the world needs is more good guys like you!
Reinforcements have arrived! Now we’ll show ’em…
Hey! I say we work together on this - you in?
Ugh, that was a close one! Thanks, man. Come by our base - Duty doesn’t forget good deeds.
We’d be pushing up daisies now if not for you. Come by our base and let Duty do their duty to you.
We were this close to biting the big one! Come by our base so we can thank you properly!
We fought them off! Thanks, everybody!
We managed to hold our positions.
Don’t bring a knife to a gunfight, fools.
Hey merc! Help Duty fight off some stalker rabble!
Help us, friend! Bandits are your enemies, too!
Hey, dude! We need your help with these snot-nosed punks from the Swamps!
Help us clear off that Freedom scum!
The military is putting us in a vice! We need your support or we’re done for!
Hey stalker! We need your help against the Zone’s spawns!
The zombies are getting to us, we need your help!
Where are you? We need your help!
Merc, where are you?!
We can’t wait for you forever! Get over here!
… What happened? Report!
… This is base, respond immediately…
… Squad! What’s up with you..?
… Hello! You need any help?
Attention! We can’t reach our squad - it’s up to you to figure out what happened. Go.
It could be a technical problem, but my gut tells me that ain’t it. We gotta check it out.
Alright, get a squad ready and move out. Our boys ain’t responding.
What on earth happened there? We’ll go check.
People! On your feet, double-quick time!
Yeah, anything could happen. Moving out!
Duty, attack!
Here’s what I owe you - with interest!
Gun ’em down, boys!
Attention! Get ready for action!
Show them what Duty is made of! Get ready!
Check your weapons and follow the leader!
Spread out!
Attention! Everyone take your positions!
Spread out and get ready for action!
Is this ever gonna end?
Time to answer the call of Duty, eh?
The enemy’s everywhere… They keep coming… and coming… and coming…
I’m doing this for the greater good of us all… for the greater good…
Let me put my boots on at least…
The territory is ours!
We knocked the bastards out!
Enemy eliminated! Hurrah!
I see the enemy! Anyone who wants to fight for the good cause, join in!
Enemy detected! We’re gonna attack!
Enemy contact. Getting ready for an attack.
Wait… Don’t open fire till I say so!
Shoot before I give the command and you’ll be sitting on a peg!
Keep your eyes peeled! Attack on my command!
Visual contact! Everyone get ready!
I see the enemy!
Enemy spotted!
Reporting: enemy driven off.
Roger. The position is under our control.
Location captured, awaiting further instructions.
Fire for effect!
Open fire!
FIRE!!!
Merc, we’re waiting for your signal! Over.
Hey, everything all right with you?
Check your head sometime, aight? We got people waiting here.
How much ammo we got left? We’re expecting guests.
Keep on your guard! We may get counterattacked!
Stay alert, the enemy can attack any minute now!
Our squad is ready for action. Waiting for your signal!
Fighters are in position. Just signal when!
Everything is ready! You signal when to start!
Attention! We’ve been detected!
We’ve been detected by the enemy!
We’ve given ourselves away!
That’s it, now we’ll teach them a lesson!
Nice of you to come! They ain’t gonna get a warm welcome now!
Thanks for coming to our help! Let’s show them who’s boss!
Thanks for helping out! Drop by our base some time - we’ll find a way to pay you back, that’s a promise!
Thanks for helping out! Come by our base when you get a minute - we’ll return the favor.
Thanks, merc! You really turned it around! Your reward will be waiting for you at the base.
We barely held them off!
Man, that was some fine defensive action!
Another attack repelled!
Merc, help us fight these bandits!
Duty is crushing us! Help us deal with them, man!
Hey buddy, these Freedom fighters are squeezing us real tight! Help!
Man, help us deal with the army boys!
Help us, merc! Mutants are everywhere!
Hey, man! Help us fend off some stalkers!
Get over here! The zombies are coming at us!
Quick! We’re getting slaughtered here!
We can’t hold on much longer! Hurry, help us!
Damn you! Where on earth are you?
… Attention! This is base… Answer me…
… What’s going on over there?
… Damn you! Come in, now!
… Damn it…
Get a move on and see what’s happened with our boys. They ain’t responding.
We’ve lost contact with our guys. We must go and see what’s going on.
The guys aren’t responding. Something must have happened to them.
Task is clear! Carrying out.
We’re on it.
I wonder who they ran into… We’re moving out.
For our friends!
Eat a bullet for papa!
Taste some hot lead, assface!
Squad! Move out!
The enemy never sleeps! Get ready!
Squad, follow me!
Scatter out in a chain! Be at the ready!
Everyone spread out.
Squad, assume your positions!
Here we go again…
When will it stop?
Boy, am I tired of these trips.
Christ, can’t I even enjoy one meal?!
I can’t take this anymore!
We cut ’em up good…
We smashed them to pieces!
Whoa! That was a nice fight, wasn’t it?
Enemy detected. Prepare to attack.
Enemy spotted, getting ready to attack.
We’re getting ready to attack. Join in if you like.
Attack on my signal!
Don’t attack without my command!
Shoot only on my command!
Here they are. Get ready for action!
Enemy detected!
I see the target!
Base, we’ve captured the target location.
Position captured. Over.
Base, we’ve dislodged the enemy.
Attack! Get ’em!
Fire! Attack!
Mow them down! Fire!
You awake over there? We’re waiting up for you.
C’mon man, this ain’t funny. Come in.
Hey, you alive over there or what?
No resting! By the looks of things, we should be expecting visitors.
Watch for any movements. The enemy could be right on us!
Keep your guard! We’re expecting an attack.
Merc, we’re ready to join the action on your command!
Merc, we’ll attack on your signal!
Merc, we’re waiting for your signal!
Damn! They spotted us!
We’ll have to fight out in the open!
They see us! I repeat, they see us!
We, err… Good of you to show up when you did!
Hey! So, how about we give them cocksuckers a damn good kicking?
Ooh! Now it’s gonna get real hairy for them!
Whoa, I haven’t seen anything this rough for a while… Drop by sometime, and we’ll give you something for your trouble.
Thanks! For a minute there I thought we were all going to meet our maker… Pop in some time at the base so we can pay you back.
I was about to give up the ghost, but hey, here we are. You oughta come see us at our base for your reward.
He came, he saw, he sucked major cock! Mua-ha-ha!
We kicked them suckers’ asses good!
Consider this breakfast! Now if anyone else tries the same shit, they’ll be dessert!
Yo, man! Help us give Clear Sky a black eye!
You gotta help us, bro! These uptight faggots are dipping us in some stinky shit!
Those anarchist assholes are banging us hard - help!
Help us out, bro! We gotta spank some army ass!
Yo, brother! We need your help with some butt-ugly beasts!
We need you, bro! Some assholes are coming after us!
Come to us, quick! The dead are killing the living over here!
We’re getting plugged over here! Are you a man or what?
We’re about to croak here, bro! Get over here!
Where the hell are you?! We’re getting butchered!
… Yo, boys, listen up…
… You ain’t all dead over there, are ya?
… C’mon, get on the air already…
… Hey, brother… We ain’t clear on what’s going on…
Looks like our guys got lost. We gotta check it out and see what’s up.
Our brothas got themselves into some kinda shit. Drag your asses over there and get a line on it.
Our homeys are laying low. Gotta take a peek and see whassup.
Ain’t no thang! We’ll get cracking on it!
Don’t worry, boss, we’re going.
Yeah, yeah, we’re getting to it.
Here, catch this!
Get in line, assholes!
Smoke those punks, boys!
Get your asses up and follow me!
On your feet and go-go-go!
It’s crunchtime, so crank it up!
Quit holding hands, girlies! Scamper out!
Time to nail those faggots! Spread out, quick!
Stop herding like cattle! We’re about to smoke ’em!
They’re getting on my nerves for real!
What the..?! Just as I was grabbing a bite!
Ah dammit, now what?
I’m gonna put ’em all to rest!
This is just a drill, right?
We owned the losers! Hell yeah!
The suckers are out cold! Check their pockets, bros!
They made for some good porkchops, eh?
Lookie here, the little bitches actually showed up! Who’s up for some ass whoopin’?
Yo, dawgs, we found some suckas to pump some lead into. Come have fun!
Yo, join up and let’s waste these bitches!
Jump when I say “jump”, shoot when I say “shoot”. Are we clear?
We smoke the turds when I say so! Got that?
Fire only when I tell you!
Whoa! We got another fat cat to fleece here!
Jiggers, guys! We’ve got guests!
Well, smack my ass and call me Dolly! What a meeting!
The faggots are down. We got the spot now.
We wasted the sons of bitches. The area is now ours.
Holy shit, we’re done! Nothing but dead bodies around.
Give it to them! Make ’em feel the pain!
Enough jacking off! Go, go, go!
Bite a bullet, bitch!
Don’t be slow, bro. Everything’s going great, just waitin’ on you.
What the hell are we doing here? It’s about time to go on a rampage!
Yo, you going low? When are we going to war, huh?
Keep your cheeks together and your eyes peeled!
It’s too early to celebrate! They’re gonna come at us again!
Wipe that smile off your face! Keep on the lookout!
It’s all good. Just say when!
We’re in position. Just holler when you want to start.
We’re here. Give us a jingle, alright?
Holy shit! We got our picture took!
Dammit, we got trumped!
Shit! They got us down pat…
Don’t fret, hold your positions!
Don’t panic!
Damn! What is that?
Did you hear that?!
What was that?
A friggin’ bloodsucker!!!
Damn mutant…
Curse that bastard!
Oh crap, what the hell is that thing??
Keep your eyes peeled!
Boys, stay alert…
Die you bloodsucking scum!
There it is!
Not again!
Cross your fingers.
Maybe I’m just hearing things…
Stand fast, hold your positions.
Don’t panic!
Damn! What is that?
Did you hear that?!
What was that?
Friggin’ bloodsucker!!!
Damn mutant…
Curse that bastard!
Oh crap, what the hell is that thing??
Keep your eyes peeled!
Boys, stay alert…
Die you bloodsucking scum!
There it is!
Not again!
Let’s hope we make it!
Maybe it’s nothing?
We need two of you at the valve and two of you with me! Merc, you get on the hangar roof and cover both squads.
We’re at the valve and ready to begin on your order.
Valve fixed in position. Initiate activation!
Watch out, zombies to the left of the building!
Watch out, zombies by the truck!
They’re on the roof!
Zombies in the hangar!
We’re doing good! Don’t let up!
Keep it up!
That’s another down!
Great! The cooling station is working again. The psy-field is stable. It’s time for us to get out of here…
You did it! My sensors show that psy-emission levels are falling! That means that the cooling station is stable. I very much hope that Yantar will become a quieter place from here on in!
Good news, professor! We’re on our way back to the bunker.
Thank you, merc. By the way, I’m getting a decent signal from Strelok. It looks like he’s not far from you, heading straight for the Red Forest.
Let’s move out!
Merc, your position is on the roof! Follow the stalker!
Quit wasting time, merc. Follow me!
Good, you’re in position. Now hold it.
I’ll cover you!
We’re in position. The roof is clear. Fixing the valve in position.
Shit! Zombies are coming from all sides!
How many of them are there? They’re everywhere! Aaaaa!
Aaaa! There’s too many of them! Help!
We need help - provide supporting fire!
Aaaa! They’re everywhere! We’re going to die in here!
Zombies are trying to break into the hangar! There’s too many of them!
They’re killing us!
Phew, we fought them off… It should get easier from here…
We’re in the hangar! Fixing the valve in position.
Take that you zombie bastards!
How do you like some of that?
You like how that shit works?
I’m gonna give you some lead salad to chew on!
I’m holding ’em!
Damn! They’re coming right at us!
Is this ever gonna end?!
Bring it on you bastards!
The scientists’ bunker is under attack! If you can hear us - please help!
Thanks for coming to our aid, merc! Get in position and fire at will!
Thank you for your help, merc! Zombie attacks have really increased lately. If you want to talk to the scientists, they’re inside the bunker.
Howdy, merc. During the operation you do what I say, when I say, got it?
Enemy right!
Another on the left!
Enemy right down!
Enemy left down!
Get in position and watch the rear! You two, give ’em hell!
Clear, let’s move out!
Dearest Lefty. I have some new data. It appears that we should be able to stabilize the psy-emissions. A young man is on his way, so please wait for him and further instructions.
Yes, professor. Awaiting your instructions.

Lefty, according to my data the psy-emissions are generated by an unidentified device located under the factory. The psy-field is unstable because of a malfunction in that device’s cooling station. Your objective is to restart the cooling system. I have sent all the information you require to your PDA. The diagram indicates two valves used to initiate the restart. You must activate both valves. Get in position and I’ll inform you when psy-emissions fall to a safe level.
Professor, we are ready to start on your signal.
Lefty, the psy-field emission level is currently at its lowest. Please begin the operation! All our hopes and prayers are with you! Good luck!

Aaaaa, my head… My head is killing me, I can’t think straight..! Ivan… attacked us all of a sudden… Aaaa… The voices in my head, the damn psy-emission… At least we managed to get the documents… All we need to do is get them to Sakharov… Crap, the dogs are on our trail… I don’t want to… Noooooooo… Oh God!
We’re almost there. I repeat: our objective is to fix the two valves in position and restart the cooling station.
I’ll be right there!
Just a minute!
Merc, get back in position. We’re dropping like flies!
We lost the squad. The device became uncontrollable. An emission is approaching! Aaaaaaagrhhhhhhhhhh!
Glad to see you, merc. We’ve done the impossible - we fought our way into the very center of the Zone, to the power plant, and mostly thanks to you.
Petrenko, get a scan of Strelok’s PDA frequency.
Commander, Strelok is very close.
Lebedev, this is the recon squad. We got a visual on Strelok.
Merc, climb onto the heat pipeline and intercept Strelok. We’ll cover you from the ground.

Merc, here’s an electromagnetic gun prototype. It will let you disable Strelok’s psy-protection and help stop him. Without protection, Strelok won’t last long under the emission. Even our own suits can barely neutralize the field. Get up close to Strelok and cut off his psy-protection.
Fire the gauss rifle at Strelok to weaken his psy-protection.
Less time wasting, more Strelok shooting.
Merc, your goal is Strelok. Move up and unload into him.
Merc, take your foot off the brake! Chase Strelok down or he’ll get away.
Strelok is getting away. Do something!
Strelok’s psy-protection is down to almost zero. Just a bit more, merc, and it’ll be completely disabled.
Attention! Distract the Monolith fighters!
C’mon, guys! Cover me!
Bash those friggin’ zombie skulls!
Bastards! Kill ’em!
Don’t let them flank us!
Enemy on the left flank!
All units, rapid fire!
Take that you assholes!
Oh Mama, don’t wait up for me, I shall make my new home at the bottom of the sea!
Petrovich, cover our backs, will ya?
Take it like men! Stand strong!
A man only dies once, brothers!
They’re coming from the right! Whoever’s there, provide support fire!
I’m low on ammo! Pull back to the anomalies!
Fellas, we’re making a move - keep ’em pinned for us!
Shit! Guys, I’m done for!
I hate you!
I’ll show you!
This is it, lads! My time’s up! Farewell!
Kill those damn Monolithians!
Someone take out that damn sniper!
On the left, be careful!
Forward, go go go!
I’m gonna try to flank them!
I’m hit, damn it, I’m hit!
I’m dying over here!
Mosquito is no more! Assuming command!
Pick it up, fellas! Let’s kill ’em dead!
Squeeze the life out of ’em! Attack!
Looks like it’s over for me… Forgive me, brothers!
Anyone alive in my sector? Don’t… argh!
Alex, you there? Come in, dammit!
Keep ’em pinned, Igor!
Feed him a grenade, Paulie!
Up there! That cocksucker’s hiding at the top!
Where are they all coming from?
Strelok’s psy-protection has been disabled - that ought to stop him. Now we just wait and see what happens…
How are the readings? Any drop in the level of anomalous activity?
Damn, I didn’t expect anything like this! Anomalous activity is through the roof!
But the Zone was supposed to calm down!
Aaahhh… What’s going on… My head’s about to explode… Aaahhh…
We let Strelok get away! He’s already inside the power plant.
An emission is coming… The readings are going off the scale… Everyone, find cover… Aaaahhhh!
Merc, hurry up! You’re very close to Strelok!
That’s him! Take him down!
Don’t let him get into the tunnel!
Hold him until Strelok is out of the tunnel!
Merc, I blew up the tunnel. You will not stop me. I am going to reach the center of the Zone - whatever it takes.
Strelok’s signal is gone. We lost him.
He went towards the Scorcher, and from there it’s not far to the center of the Zone. For us, though, trying to get through the Scorcher without the scientists’ prototype would be suicide!
Our only hope of catching Strelok is to go through Limansk. I know of a tunnel that leads there - it starts just beyond the bridge…
This is the only known way of reaching the city. The bridge can only be lowered from the other side, but that’s bandit territory.

Shit, there must be a way of getting across! Maybe there’s another road to the other shore… Well, if anyone can help us get to Limansk, it’s Forester. They say that old timer can find safe roads through areas he’s never been in. The old man’s hut is on the edge of the Red Forest. Merc, find Forester.
Hello, mercenary. What brings you here?
Merc, get here, quick! Leshiy’s squad is almost here!
Leshiy’s squad is approaching. Our job is to cover them so they can get through to the bridge. Take up a position on the second floor of the tower and get ready!
This is Leshiy. Our squad is approaching the bridge.
Leshiy, Lebedev here. We’re looking forward to seeing you!
Attention all fighters! Let’s clear a path for Leshiy! Open fire!
This is Leshiy, we’ve managed to secure a position next to the bridge.
We’re gonna try to lower the bridge. Commander, cover us.
Private, get to the bridge control panel, now!
Soldier, run to the bridge control panel!
Private, get to the bridge control panel!
Lebedev, cover my man at the control panel! The bandits are trying to get him!
Damn it! They have snipers covering the control panel. There’s no way we can lower the bridge while they’re alive.
Damn it! There’s a sniper on the hill! Take him out!
What the hell are you doing? Take that sniper down, now!
Sniper on the hill!
Take out that sniper!
Kill that sniper!
There are too many bandits - we can’t move!
The bandits have us pinned! Try to provide supporting fire.
Lebedev, put some fire on those bandits - they won’t let us move!
Merc, get back in position! We must get that bridge lowered!!!
Attention all units. Another massive emission is coming. It looks like Strelok managed to reach the center of the Zone. We failed to stop him! Get to cover, NOW! GO, GO, GO!
The bridge is down! Attack!
Thank you, Leshiy! We sure as hell owe you one!
Thank the merc. If it weren’t for him we’d be stuck in that Bubble trap forever.
Either way, I owe you.
I’ll keep that in mind! Good luck to you!
That’s a deal!

Clear Sky fighters, we have completed a brilliant operation! The bridge has been lowered and the road to Limansk is now open. Advanced squad: move out into Limansk and find a safe path through the city. Everyone else: hold the bridge and wait for the main squad.
Merc, get back in position right now. Leshiy’s group is barely holding on. If we don’t get that bridge lowered - we will fail.
Merc, follow the advanced squads into the city - your job is to find a safe road through Limansk for the main squad. Be careful: a real war has broken out in the city.
End your pursuit now, mercenary… or you will die.

Merc, I don’t have any information about a path through the Red Forest. There are many rumors about these woods, but we don’t have any other option - we must find a way through the Red Forest and find Forester.
Well done, merc - you made it through the Red Forest. Forester’s hut is really close.
It’s been a while since I’ve seen someone other than monsters come out of the Forest. Well, come on over, big guy - let’s have a chat.
… Help. SOS… Can anyone hear us…
… We can’t get out of quadrant eighty four… Warping… Coming back…
… Base, come in… Base… Come in…
… Get us out of here…
… Survived the emission… Lost our bearings…
… It’s like a maze…
It’s been a long time since anyone’s come through the Red Forest! Merc, come over here and I’ll fill you in.
Wow! I’d never have guessed you’d be able deal with that bloodsucker!

… If you can hear me… We’re stuck in an anomaly… We can’t get out… It’s like space is warped… Whichever way we go… Can’t move… Equipment has gone off the rails… Can see the outlines of a town on the horizon… Our coordinates… 51… 10… 3… 1… 2… Is there anybody out there? …
Merc, this is Forester. I’ve made a little diagram explaining how to get out of the Bubble. I’m sending you the coordinates. After the squad gets them, they’ll be able to get out no problem.
If you want to talk, put that weapon away and come over here nice and slow.
Kostyan, this is Hog. Remember me? You better, ’cause I saved your ass a couple of weeks back.
Sure, Hog, what can I do for you?
Kostyan, I need you to help this one fella get to the antenna at the military base. I heard you’re in that area, is that right?
That’s right, we’re trying to capture the warehouses. Come on over and we’ll kick some military ass together.
Not this time, Kostyan, sorry. We can’t be seen fighting the military. I can only send you one man.
One more shooter ain’t never gonna hurt… We’ll wait for him.
Merc, head over to Kostyan; he’ll help you reach the transmitter.
Merc, we’re stuck by the HQ! The army boys have holed up in there and they got this whole area covered - we can’t move an inch! Help us capture the HQ!
Attack! Finish those army bastards!
Great, now the military base is ours! Freedom will set up a base here and close the barrier once and for all! Thanks for your help, merc. Go ahead, the transmitter is all yours.

We’ve received the coordinates and we’re going to try to get out of the Bubble… OK, left here… Sixty feet this way… Hot dang! We’re free! You hear me? We made it out of the anomaly! We’re heading for Limansk!

Lebedev here. We’re at the bridge, waiting for mercenaries to arrive from the direction of the bandit camp any time soon. Come back to the bridge, we need you here - it’s going to get pretty nasty here before long.
Merc, the intercepted communications explain a lot. Come back to my hut - I’ve got an idea or two on how to get the mercenaries out of the Bubble.
Objective accomplished! The tower is under our control. Now we just need to hold it!
Merc, get to the tower and stay alert!
Enemy spotted advancing from the ruined church. Get ready!
We have the tower, now we can start clearing the path to the factory. Open your PDA and play it by ear.
Base, this is oh-one-two. I see a mercenary in the marsh. Instructions, over?
Oh-one-two, this is Base. Terminate him!
That’s affirmative, Base. Proceeding.
Shit! The bastard hid in the reeds! Now unless we burn the whole thing, we ain’t got a chance in hell of finding him!
Oh-one-two, this is Base. Keep patrolling.
Ten-four, Base.
Excellent! The road to the factory is clear. Moving out.
Well done, fellas! The swamp pump is back under our control.
Cold, leave the merc alone with your dirty jokes. I need to see him.
Well, brother, if Lebedev says he needs to see you, that ain’t up for discussion. Go on… I’ll catch you later.
Trader, a fighter is on his way to you. Issue him with all the equipment he’ll need for the mission.
Roger that.
Hurry, merc.
Run for the tower, the monsters can’t get you there!
Whew, you’re right on time, bro! I’m real low on ammo, so let’s make the best of it together.
Attention all fighters! An emission is approaching! Get to cover, NOW!
This is the second outpost, we’re under attack! I repeat: we’re under attack, help!
Merc, there are anomalies ahead, be careful! Remember, don’t move until you’ve thrown a bolt in front of you.

Oh, by the way, you can sometimes find artifacts in anomalies. You can’t see them, but detectors spot them easily enough. If you get close enough, your detector will indicate the location of the artifact. And then you just pick it up - easy as pie. Keep in mind that your current detector isn’t exactly top of the line: it only shows the distance to the artifact.
Well done, men! We’ve reinforced our position in the Swamps enough to give the renegades a real good kicking! Our next objective is their main base!
We’ve captured the renegades’ lair. All we need to do now is take control of the paths to the Swamps.
Shit! The renegades are stronger than us! We need to do something about that before we lose the war!
The Swamps are now under our control! Good job, boys, you did it! All squads - dig in at key positions and wait for further instructions!
The renegades managed to recapture their lair! We can’t allow those bastards to live right on our doorstep. We need to smoke them out of their base, whatever it takes!
Attention, we have lost control of the paths to the Swamps. If we don’t recapture them, the Swamps will become a breeding ground for scum once more!
Your main guide is the Objectives section.
Your main objective is displayed here…
Together with a selected additional objective.
There can be several additional objectives, which you can cycle through using these buttons.
Most objectives are also displayed on the map, with the exception of rare occasions when your objectives cannot be located.

We will need your help with not only destroying the enemy, but also capturing key positions. In these situations our fighters will be grateful if you provide covering fire as they capture a position. By the way, don’t ignore calls for help - our boys’ lives could be at stake.
Hovering over a mark on the map will display additional information.
In addition to your objectives, friendly units and identified enemies will also be displayed on the map.
OK, as I’m sure you understand, our main objective is to establish control over the Swamps, and that means a war against the aggressor.
This section allows you to access tactical information about combat operations at any time.
Information about your current faction is displayed on the left. Right now that’s us, Clear Sky.
Information about the main enemy is displayed on the right.
This shows our approximate combat strength.
This shows how many fighters we have.
And this is our equipment supply.
Right at the bottom you’ll find symbols indicating the special features of our combat equipment.
Similar indicators are also shown for our enemy.
Finally, this field allows you to see the current strategic mission, as well as tactical objectives that must be achieved in order to complete the strategic mission.
Completed strategic missions will be displayed at the bottom.
The last tab allows you to view your current relations with all factions, as well as each faction’s combat strength.
Your personal stats are also displayed here.
That’s pretty much it.
We’re there, so you can take your blindfold off. Don’t you try to follow me, it won’t work anyway! If you want to come back to the base find one of the guides at the fishing hamlet.
Home, sweet, home! Go ahead and take your blindfold off. You’ll find me here when you’re ready to go back to the Swamps.

Merc, it looks like you’re at the Great Swamps now. Be extremely careful and don’t try to be a hero. Check out your PDA - you should find the location of our squads there. I suggest you get yourself over to the fishing hamlet - that’s where they are.
Excellent, merc - you are in Limansk. There’s a real war going on, so be very, very careful. Help the advanced squads find a safe path through the city.
Shit! We’re under fire and taking casualties! We need help ASAP!
Merc, come over here - I’ll fill you in. And keep your head down!

Man, this is some mess I’m in. There’s a real street war going on here. There’s an MG nest on the balcony of the building to the left. They’re not holding back up there - we’re totally pinned. If we can take out the machine gunner we’ll be able to keep going. I’ll draw his attention and you head into the building and deal with that MG. Go on my signal.
Go, merc, go!
C’mon, move your ass!
What the hell are you waiting for? Go, go, go!
This is Captain Serov, leader of the Clear Sky squad. We are approaching the intersection. Hold on, merc, we’re coming to help.
Enemy down! Merc, make your way over here and I’ll fill you in.

We need to move further into the city. Our boys are stuck by the canal beyond the square and we’re on our way to help them. You seem to know how to handle yourself - why don’t you stick with us and make things easier for us both?
All clear. Let’s move out!
They’re attacking from all sides! Take up defensive positions!
Damn, how many are there?!
Dammit, how many are there? They’re coming from all directions! Merc, keep moving towards the canal; we’ll hold the enemy!
Merc! Get out of here, now! Don’t waste your ammo.
Alpha, hold your position!
Commander, we’re under enemy fire! Requesting help.
Keep it together! Give ’em hell!

You couldn’t have picked a better time to show up, merc. We’re stuck here in a terrible position. The enemy is in the building across the canal and we’re sitting ducks here! Lebedev ordered us to take the bridge. We need to clear and secure that building, whatever it takes!
The enemy is in the building on the other side. We’re sitting ducks here - there’s no point in attempting an attack, we’ll just die for nothing.

We’ll keep them busy so that you can run from cover to cover and get right up to the building. Once you’re there you know what to do - just kill that bastard machine gunner! These assholes have caused us enough grief.
Oh and merc - keep it cool. Move from cover to cover and only on my command!
Squad, cover the merc! Fire!
Shit, he’s in the building!
The emplacement is out of action! Let’s move!
Take up positions in the building. You couldn’t ask for a better strategic spot.

Thanks for your help, merc! We’ll stay here and keep an eye on the bridge until the main squad arrives. You need to keep moving. According to the map, we’re very close to the edge of Limansk. The coordinates are on your PDA.
Hey, merc!
Good to see you.
The exit from Limansk is very close, but we need to stay alert and proceed with caution.
Sniper in the tower! Take cover!
Vasilenko, close in and smoke that sniper out! Go!
Damn, those bastards have put up a fence, and even got power running through it!
The town has no electricity supply. That means there must be a generator around here somewhere supplying that fence with power.
The cables lead into the building to the right. Merc, we’ll distract the sniper so you can get inside the Institute building and shut down that generator!
Great, the power to the fence has been cut. Advance.
Lebedev, the enemy has been eliminated! Awaiting further orders!
Lebedev, we have the bridge. Let’s hope they don’t try to recapture it.
Captain Serov reporting! We fought off the attack. The road is clear.

Good job! The main squad is ready to move through Limansk. Advanced squad: your objective is to find the entrance to the Pripyat underground. The entrance is at the old hospital on the edge of Limansk. The coordinates are on your PDA.
We’re advancing. Stay alert people.
Target at 11 o’clock.
Let’s go and check it out.
Help! Help!
I didn’t expect to see bandits here. Let’s take ’em all down.
Don’t shoot! I can tell you about the bandits’ ambush.
Spill the beans and we might spare your life.
Gimme a medkit for my partner.
You’ll have to do without. You have one minute. Tell me where the ambush is or I’ll shoot you like a dog.
Gimme a medkit!
Execute him.
Thanks for the medkit, merc.
The ambush is really close. Here, let me mark it on your PDA.
You may live, but don’t let me catch sight of you ever again.

Without going into detail, I must say I have never seen anything like this before. The encephalogram suggests serious damage to the nervous system, but the other indicators couldn’t be better. It’s astounding!
Perhaps it has something to do with the emission?
Most certainly! Although so far I’ve been utterly unable to formulate a rational explanation for this abnormality.
Look, he’s waking up!
You’re awake? That’s good.
Thank God someone responded! Listen, there’s a sniper and a machine gunner on the other side of the hall. We can’t even make a move!
Shit, another one lost his cool… Merc, help us take out that sniper before we all die here! We’ll distract the machine-gunner, so you can make a run for it!
Well done, man, you did it! Now they’re going down!
What are you waiting for?! We’ll try to suppress them again!
Wake up! We can’t keep him pinned forever.
Hey, quit wasting time!
The hell are you waiting for?! We’ll try to suppress them again - get ready!
Wake up! We can’t keep him pinned forever.
Hey, quit wasting time!
That’s one! One more remaining, move out!
There goes the second one! Both approaches cut off!
Stalker, cover us!
An MG is covering the ground floor. Stay in until I give the order!
Go!
Go!
MG is down! The way is clear!
Hold on! We’re on our way!
Petro, take out that pillbox downstairs!
Have a grenade, you bastard!
You did it! Now you can flank the sniper from behind. Deal with him!
Kill him or we’re all dead meat!
Get the sniper! Fast!
Help, we’re pinned at the entrance!
Aaaaa…
Block the passageways so they can’t bring in reinforcements.
Great, that’s the sniper down. The road is clear. We’re moving out to try and blow up that pillbox.
Cover me! I’m gonna try to take him out!
Go on! We’ll hold the enemy!
Base, we’re at the entrance to the catacombs! What now?
Great! Get in position and hold the entrance to the catacombs. The main squad is on its way.
On my command!
On my command!
Well done! Keep it up!
Shit, that’s a military chopper! Take it down! Aim for the cockpit!
Oh-two-one, take them all out!
Shiiiiiit! We’re hit, we’re hit! Pull out, pull out!
Base, this is oh-two-one. I see an enemy squad plus an unidentified stalker. Requesting orders.
Roger that, Base. Commencing attack!
He’s trying to get through!
Stop him!
Roger that. We’re on it.
Merc, we’ll hold the Monolithians, while you go down into the catacombs.

I gave Fang the component we found in the cache. He wouldn’t stop swearing and said he wouldn’t pay us until we found the other components. We discussed it between ourselves and decided to send Vasya to speak to him. Vasya is one silver-tongued son of a gun; we figured he might be able to talk Fang into paying us at least some of the money. I just hope he doesn’t run into trouble on the way there…
Hey buddy, watch out! There’s a shitload of dogs around here! Climb onto the rocks, quick!
Hey now, piss off!
Leave me alone, dammit!
Get away from me you friggin’ fleabags.

Thanks buddy, you saved me right there! My name is Vasyan. Picture this: I’m on my way west trying to catch up with this stalker, minding my own business and all, and these eyeless beasts come out of nowhere! I emptied three clips into the damn things but they just kept on coming and chased me all the way to here! There’s no way I’ll catch that stalker now - he’s gotta be in the Dark Valley at this point!
I got cut off from Fang by a pack of dogs. It looks like he went east to the Dark Valley.
This place is pretty damn good. Look at all these stalkers charging in here like flies to honey. I wonder what they’re after…
Gah, it’s too bad that punk got away!
Screw him! He dropped his shit, that’s all that matters.
Yeah, let’s grab the best stuff and get the hell outta here…

Well, Fang, the situation has changed. Someone knows we reached the center of the Zone and they’re looking for us. We’ve got to move, and fast. You’ll find a detailed plan of action in our stash. I changed the code.
You still with us, merc? Good, good. Fang’s PDA is right next to you somewhere. Find it!

Merc, this is Lebedev. Information from Fang’s PDA confirms my suspicions. An unidentified group of stalkers visited the center of the Zone… I don’t know how, but they even managed to survive the large emission. It would have been better if they hadn’t, because the Zone will not be pacified until the path to the center is a secret once more. There are two ways that could happen: either we stop this group of stalkers or the Zone releases more emissions to destroy everything in it… and maybe outside it too! Clearly, it would be better if we did it ourselves, but we have to act quickly if we’re to stand any chance of success. Fang’s PDA contains the coordinates of their stash - I am confident we can find information about their plans in there…
Hey, it’s your call… Feel free to piss away your luck!
Grow some balls and get your ass back here!
Hey man, you’re not pussying out on me, are you?
Hey, buddy, put that shooter away and come over here - we need to have a chat.
Why don’t you holster that weapon and get your butt over here, old man?
Listen, we need to talk. Just put that gun away first.
Stop right there, buddy! Keep your hands where I can see ’em!
Freeze! And don’t even think of touching that shooter.
Don’t move, old man! Keep your weapon pointed at the ground and stay nice and still.
Atta boy, now just stay right there.
Good, good… and no sudden movements!
Stay right there, old man!
Listen, man - if you wanna get past here you gotta pay. Come over here and we’ll talk about it.
Don’t just stand there, get yourself over here!
Move, dammit, move!
Are you dumb or something? Piss off!
Listen up, get your ass in gear before I bust a cap in it!
Well, you asked for it… Drop him, boys!
Listen, you, get out of my face!
You’re a bit slow on the uptake, buddy. Piss off!
Up to you… Waste him!
Drop him!
Waste the bastard!
Don’t friggin’ move!
Freeze, bitch!
Put that gun away, dumbass!
Hey, buddy, you better hide that shooter!
Whack the bastard, boys - he’s got cash!
The smuggler’s PDA? Send me the latest notes. Aha! We’ve got the weapon cache coordinates. I’ll send my boys there right now! Come see me… We have some business to discuss face to face.

Man, I was sure as hell I’d die here like a dog! I… I don’t even know how to thank you… Wait! I DO know how to thank you. I’m gonna upload the coordinates of a place me and the boys used to stash our loot before we were captured and sent here. My buddies won’t need it no more where they are now, may they rest in peace, and I’m getting the hell out of the Zone right this moment. I figure anywhere’s better than this place…
Merc, something is attacking our boys not far from you. They’re screwed if they don’t get help soon!
Damn! The boys are dead and whatever killed them is gone too, you can bet your socks on that… Man, life just sucks sometimes…
Man, you’re a hero! You paid ’em back for our boys, may they rest in peace… But a “thank you” ain’t worth much, so pop in to see me at the flea market - I’ve got something for you.
Get outta here, old man. We tend to get real jumpy around here; watch it so you don’t catch a “stray” bullet…
Listen, dumbass. This here’s our area and our camp, so why don’t you find yourself a road that don’t lead to a grave?
Now that’s what I call a real man! That was awesome!
Wow, dude… You’re a real sniper.
Hot damn, did you see that? That was the shit right there!
Learn to shoot, numbnuts!
That’s shit! Save yourself the trouble and shoot yourself next time…
He must have a hangover if he’s shooting that bad…
There it is, do it!
Take ’em down!
You even know how to use that thing?
C’mon man, I believe in you!
Get the wings, the wiiiiings!
Ah well, I’ll chance it. Here’s a fifty on that dude…
No way I’m putting up any cash on that loser!
This is gonna be fun to watch!
Let’s see if he can hold his gun straight.
Ha-ha! That sucker hasn’t got a chance!
He looks like he might be alright, you know…
Wow, you beat my record! I’m impressed… Here, take this…
Dude, you beat your record. Here’s your reward.
Man, you’re the new champ! To the victor go the spoils!
You got a bit unlucky, try again.
Have another go, buddy. You’ll do it this time.
Shit happens. Give it another shot.
Hey, dude, where you going? Don’t you wanna have another game?
Hey, man, come back! You were doing good!
Come back, your luck is in, I’m telling you!
What? Stringov lured you into an ambush? Hrm, the son of a bitch will fry for this!
The scumbag kicked the bucket, huh? You may wanna check him out for something of value.
Wassup bro, this is Yoga! I see you’re no sucker. Next time you’re around our parts, stop by! I’m making you part of the team.
So, you cleaned out those fellas at the flea market? You’re a man’s man, buddy, and coming from Yoga that’s something! High-five! As usual, Tooth’s got your cut.
Judging by the PDA signal, Stringov’s dead. Good. You can collect your reward from Tooth the trader. I reckon I can give you tougher jobs from now on.

Listen, merc, my boys just wasted Stringov as he was trying to leave the Garbage. Looks like he got spooked and decided to make a run for it, so it ain’t your fault. Why don’t I give you another job instead?

Look, Stringov was feeding me info on the diggers. It seems eventually they caught on, so he’s been pretty useless recently, though some of the latest intel was pretty good. Apparently, the diggers are meeting up with some asshole north of the Garbage to buy shooters. Make sure nobody, neither the asshole nor the diggers, makes it out of there alive. I’ve uploaded the meet coordinates to your PDA.
Stringov? Quit lazing about! Why don’t you make your way over to the stop? I sent a fella there to settle things up with you.

They’ve all copped it then? Great job! You can pick up your reward from Tooth. By the way, you’re moving up the ranks. I’m putting you in charge of five of my boys and I already got your lot. I want the diggers to forget even thinking about armed resistance, so I need you and your boys to show them who’s boss. Your target is the flea market. Once you’re done with the diggers, make sure our boys secure the area and don’t let anyone in. Your team is already in position, but they won’t do shit without your command.
Nice one, boys! We’re gonna start living the good life now! It’s time to get control over all the entrances to the Garbage - let the suckers pay if they wanna haul artifacts outta here.

Ha-ha, the Garbage is Yoga’s territory now! We’re gonna milk those stalkers dry! The punks do have a base at the Cordon, though - I reckon we should pay them a little visit and help them find their place in the food chain.
Boys, we’re taking a beating here. Get your shit together and show them what you’re made of!

Boys, we got balls of steel, that’s for sure! The Cordon is ours now, and we’ll make sure the stalkers “share” their wealth with us for being here! Now, squeeze ’em so hard they don’t even stick their noses out of their base.

You friggin’ morons, what are you doing? Stalkers have got control over the road to the Cordon. You want them to carry artifacts outta here just like that or something? I want you to get over there and recapture that damn road!
Now that’s something, you boys are makin’ me real proud! We got those cockroaches cornered - all we gotta do now is squash them. Prepare to attack!
Shit! Our boys got kicked outta the Cordon. I hear there’s a whole bunch of stalkers getting together. We need to show them who the boss is around here.

We’re gonna live it up now, fellas! We can squeeze the stalkers for cash all we want and they can’t do shit to us! I say we put some dough together, say goodbye to the Zone and send a postcard from Rio!
Damn! These stalkers are getting too cocky for their own good! They took out our boys near their base! If you’re around there, show those cocksuckers how to mess with us!

Bros, stalkers are kicking our asses here! They cleared out our fellas at the Cordon and they rule the roost there now. You need to grow some balls, get over there and remind them who runs things around here!

I haven’t seen anyone come from the Swamps in a long while. You’ve come out right next to the army outpost. There’s only one thing a stalker can expect from the army and that’s a bullet, so I’d be careful if I were you.
Alert! Stalker detected! Open fire!
Target lost! Officer, take your men and clear the sector.
Hey merc, what brings you here? Come over and we’ll talk.
You got away from the army? You lucky devil! I’ve got a feeling there’s a reason for you being here. Pop in and see me if you’re in the area.
Hiya, nice to see ya! So, shall we talk business?
So you got it after all! I knew I could count on you!
Got any news about that thing we talked about?
Got that case for me?
How’s that case business coming along?
Hurry up with that case, alright?
Bring me that case as soon as you find it.
Don’t forget, I still need that case.
Good luck.
Don’t shoot, please don’t shoot…
Base, we need help! We’ve been ambushed by the army!
Brothers, help us! We can’t hold out much longer!
Go, quick! The trader put in a word for you…
C’mon, move it! They’re waiting for you at the base.
Don’t just stand there twiddling your thumbs. Go to the base.
Stay away, merc! This is stalker territory!
Don’t come near or we’ll open fire!
You’re not welcome here, merc!
Squint, this is Valerian! Where on Earth have you been for the last two days? We got a sticky situation here, and every gun counts!
Well, we can’t get through! Anomalies are blocking the way and we’re trying to find a way around ’em!
Vasiliy, remember how you promised to get me some shooters?
It’s not that I mind, Valerian! But think about it: the army’s gonna wonder why I sold weapons to stalkers…
And you think about this, Vasiliy: if we don’t put some heat on those army boys now, they’re gonna bleed us dry!
All right, Valerian. Tomorrow my man is going to bring you everything I’ve got.
Valerian, this is Belly! Is it true that you’re getting the stalkers together?
It’s true, alright. The army has gotten completely out of line. They even had the nerve to put bandits on our trail. We’ve decided to fight back.
Sign me up, then! I have my own score to settle with them… I’ll be over there tomorrow, and I’ll bring three more guys with me.
Great, thanks a lot. See you then.
Hey, Goblin! What’s new over there?
The army were machine-gunning somebody just now. Only they don’t go far out of their base ’cause they’re too afraid.
Well, keep me posted.
Man, we’ve been waiting for you a long time. Go see the leader, stat!
Good work! The military squad has been taken care of. We spotted their second squad at the depot. Merc, head on over there.
Great! That’s the army dealt with. With his buddies dead, Khaletskiy knows he ain’t got a prayer. That army rat is gonna change his tune now, that’s for sure! Merc, head back to the base.
See what being stubborn gets you? Your friends are dead and you’re still here - no one’s coming to save you. Tell me where you hid the case!
… OK, I’ll tell you… bastards. It’s at the old mill, under the roof.
… OK, I’ll tell you… bastards. It’s in the tunnel, in the upturned car.
… OK, I’ll tell you… bastards. It’s in a house not far from here, in the attic.
Would you look at that? The little shit cracked like an egg! The stash coordinates are in your PDA. Take what you find to Sidorovich - he’s waiting.
OK, merc - I’ll be waiting for you and the case.
See you around… hopefully.
Well, take care.
Hey! Where are you going? Give me the case!
Mercenary, this is Valerian. The stalkers’ clan door is open for you. If you still want to become one of us, I will be waiting for you at our base.
That’s great! Now we’re strong enough to defend ourselves. Listen up, we need to capture the paths leading to the Cordon. If we do that, the bandit scum won’t be able to get anywhere near our base.

Hah, now it won’t be so easy for the bandits to get to the Cordon. But it’s not over yet. We need to start getting ready for a move on the Garbage. We’re gonna teach those assholes a lesson they won’t forget for a long time!
Shit, the bandits are stronger than us! If we don’t even things up, we’re gonna be slaves at the Garbage in no time.

Keep it up, we managed to secure the Garbage! I repeat: the road to the Garbage is clear, and you will no longer have to pay to get in. All that’s left is to make a move for their lair and show them who’s boss!
Attention! The bandits have set up an outpost at the Cordon! If we don’t regain control of the Cordon, this place will be teeming with bandits in no time!
Good news! We’ve blocked the only exit from the bandit base. Prepare for the final assault!
Shit, we’ve lost the Garbage, but don’t worry, boys! We’ll get our shit together and give it another shot!
This day will go down in the Zone’s history as the day of victory for stalkers over bandits! No more backhanders and payments for passage! Stalkers, I salute you.
Attention! The bandits made their move and took out our boys next to their base. We need to secure the exit from the bandit base before they can spread their wings!
Attention stalkers, Valerian here! The bandits have overrun the Garbage again. God knows where they came from but the place is crawling with them. Stay alert!
Freeze! The Dark Valley is in quarantine! Put your weapon away and come here veeeeery slowly. No sudden movements! I just wanna have a chat with you…
Come over here. Relax, we won’t shoot!
Hey you, come here. Come on! We gotta check you out.
Whatcha standing there for, c’mere!
Freeze! Holster your weapon and stand still. Try pulling a fast one and you’re dead!
Come over here. Relax, we won’t shoot!
Stand still, brother, this won’t hurt.
Take that shithead down!
Dismissed.
Everything seems quiet.
Delta, this is Alpha. What was that shooting all about? What’s going on over there?
Damn, another attack! Merc, check for survivors at the outpost!
Hey! What’s happening over there? Answer me!
Come in, Delta Patrol!
Respond, damn it!
Stalker, you are on Freedom territory and that means no funny business. Come see me if you have any questions.
Atta boy! You showed those mutants! Come back for more instructions.
Merc, this is Chekhov. The outpost was attacked… I don’t know if anyone survived but the PDA is still active. It might contain some useful info. Find it and bring it to me.
Attention all Freedom squads! We just ran into mercenaries by the old farm. We’re meeting strong resistance, we need help! I repeat: we need reinforcements immediately!
Our poor little commandant sure didn’t get far! His new friends found a nice spot for him - on a tree. Alright, grab that asshole’s PDA and get right back to me.
Alright! We have the first and second antennas under control! Now we need to capture the third one!
Great job, the antennas are under our control. Initiating scan.
We have the tunnel coordinates - it’s near the deserted factory. That’s how the mercenaries are getting into the Dark Valley. Attention all squads! Find the tunnel and destroy it!
We’re at the old factory. Shit, this place is crawling with mercs! Help!
Thanks for coming, merc! We’re pinned down in the yard - they got us covered good. Help us take out the mercenaries on the roof!

The cocksuckers responsible for killing so many of our boys have been eliminated. Freedom has shown once again that if you mess with the best, you die like the rest! Soon the day will come when the Zone will be free! Merc, drop by for your reward some time.

Hey you cool dudes and cold-blooded comrades! If you’re looking to be appreciated and treated like family, that’s Freedom all the way! There’s no chores, no brainwashing and no morning wake-up drills! If you’re a real stalker who loves the free life and a good drink in the company of like-minded fellas, join right in! We’ve always got old booze for new blood!

Stalker! Life has given you a wonderful opportunity to find true friends in Freedom! Only in our ranks can you always find someone willing to cover your back and share his last loaf of bread with you.
Veterans and rookies! If you value your freedom and want to be among others like you - join us! Freedom welcomes everyone who has trodden the Zone’s paths to our doors.

Do you want to earn the respect of fellow stalkers? Do you want to build a team of loyal friends who will stick up for you in times of trouble? Do you dream of kicking some Duty ass? All this, and many other opportunities, awaits you if you join Freedom!
Here’s your chance to join the best stalker clan the Zone has to offer! Where else would you be accepted for who you are? Don’t lose your freedom - join us!
The Zone is about stalkers, and being a stalker is about freedom. Be a stalker to the end: join the Freedom faction!
Become a Freedom member! Together, we will save the Zone - the only group of truly free people on Earth!
Hey guys, what are you blasting at? Answer me!
What’s going on over there, people? Over!
What are you playing at over there?
Need any help, boys? Over.
… Come in, come in! Answer me!
… Respond, come in!
… Why are you not responding? Come in, boys!
… What the hell is going on over there? Come in!
… Damn, no signal… What happened?
… They’re not responding. What are we gonna do?
… Come in, damn you! Come in!
… Where on earth could they be?
Attention all units: we’ve just lost another squad. Keep your eyes open!
Another squad has failed to respond. What the hell is going on?
We’ve lost contact with the patrol squad. All units: exercise extreme vigilance and proceed with caution at all times.

Attention, soldiers. We’ve lost contact with another squad. It doesn’t look like those boys will be coming home tonight. Be on your guard so it doesn’t happen to you! Remember: the enemy could be lurking around any corner!
They’re flooding in from all sides. Merc, we’ll try to hold them in the yard while you head through the building.
Merc, this is Chekhov. If you still want to join us, come see me at the Freedom base. Freedom is ready to accept you into its ranks.
Good news, fellas! We now control all the roads into our Valley! We’re planning to pay Duty a visit, so if you want to join us we’re heading over to the Garbage!
Good job, fellas. We managed to secure the Garbage. Now we need to move out towards Agroprom! Make sure you don’t fire on neutral stalkers!
The enemy is trying to get into the Dark Valley! Come on, guys, let’s defend our Freedom!
Now we’re talking! Our squad managed to secure their position by the road to Agroprom! All we gotta do now is knock on Duty’s door!
Boys, we’ve lost our squad at the Garbage. Now the road to the Dark Valley is unguarded!
Agroprom has its Freedom, if you know what I mean! Great job! Now it’s high time we pin those Duty bastards at their base!
Bad news, fellas. The boys guarding the road to Agroprom are dead. We need to secure that road - whatever it takes!
Bravo! We managed to destroy Duty’s base! They ain’t gonna recover from this for a long, long time! We can finally relax and enjoy our freedom, ha-ha!
It looks like Duty organized a counterattack and retook Agroprom. That ain’t good, fellas! If this keeps up the war will go on forever!
So, who’s up for some more fighting? I hear Duty is back in these parts! They came back in their choppers, recaptured their base and cleaned out everything that moved at Agroprom.
The roof is clear, moving out.

General Krylov here. Listen, you need to stay alert - the underground is crawling with mutants. According to the map, the pump station control unit is located one level above you. I’ve sent you the coordinates. Be careful… and good luck.

Merc, this is Lebedev. The correspondence found in the stash explains a lot. We now know that Strelok’s group made it to the center and we also know that they’re planning to go there again. Reckless fools! If they succeed they’ll trigger a second large emission - an emission so powerful that every living creature in the Zone will be incinerated, and the Zone itself will become unstable. We cannot let that happen! Strelok went to Lake Yantar. You are closest to that area - try to intercept him there, and we’ll take care of Fang and Ghost.
Yo, merc! What the hell you doing here?! Run like the wind - mutants will be here any minute!

Would you look at that? Where’s your equipment, boy? This is a dangerous place - you won’t get far without a good suit and a decent weapon. Monsters have gotten pretty nasty lately, so we’ll be grateful for any assistance you can give us in fighting the Zone. If you want to make some cash, drop by the base and see the General. One of our squads is actually heading there right now. Stick with them and save yourself some trouble.
Take that, mutant freaks!
It’s the snorks! Get ’em, boys!
Stay calm! Fire in bursts!
Chernobyl veterans, join the Duty ranks! A grave responsibility lies on our shoulders. If we do not protect the world from the spreading Zone, who will?
Free stalkers, veterans and hunters - join Duty! Protecting the world from the contagious Zone is the duty of us all!
Stalker, enlist in Duty! Do your part in protecting the world from the Zone!
The world is trembling at the sight of the disease spreading from the Zone. Join Duty and help the innocent survive.
Lethal anomalies, dangerous mutants, anarchists and bandits will not stop Duty on its triumphant march to save this planet and its citizens.
Every new member of Duty is supplied with excellent gear. More importantly, fighting mutants will bring you eternal glory and carve your name in history!
We believe in our victory! The filth of the Zone will be wiped out!
Hey, soldier!
Glad to see you alive!
Welcome back!
Hey, greenie! Come join our ranks at Duty!
Hey, stalker! No funny business on Duty territory, understand?
Follow the rules and you’ll stay out of harm’s way.
Hello! Don’t be shy - come on over.
Don’t just stand there, get over here!
Soldier! Front and center, right now!
Sergeant Cheersov, I’m sending a mercenary your way. He is going into the underground. Make sure he is able to reach the hole.
General, did someone really sign up to go down into those pits?
That is correct. Make sure he’s got enough ammo.
Yes, sir!
Well… good luck to you. The sergeant will give you the necessary equipment and a few tips of his own. I’ve already sent you the lair’s coordinates.
Heads up, everybody! They could come out at any moment!
Stay focused! Keep a bead on the lair!
Watch it, everyone!
They’re coming out! Open fire!!
Great work, stalker! Life should be a little easier now that the tunnels are flooded. We owe you, man! Come see me for your reward.
Hello. Let’s find out how good you are with a weapon!
Not bad, come on over for your reward.
Better luck next time. Come here and we’ll talk.
Drop in when you feel like shooting some targets.
Attention all units. We have managed to secure Agroprom. Groups of volunteers for an attack on Freedom are forming as we speak. The immediate objective is to get a foothold at the Garbage.
We now have a foothold at the Garbage. The next step is to secure the road to the Dark Valley. Do not engage neutral stalkers.
Enemy forces have infiltrated Agroprom. We cannot fight Freedom until our base is safe! Destroy the enemy and secure all known roads to Agroprom.
We are ready for an attack on the Dark Valley. All units, maintain maximum battle readiness.
Attention all units! We have lost our foothold at the Garbage. We need it to launch an attack on Freedom’s base - recapture it!
Good news! Our advanced units have captured an outpost in the Dark Valley! Now nothing can stop us from an assault on Freedom’s base!
All units, the enemy has attacked our forces at the Garbage. We no longer have control of the road to the Dark Valley.

All units, we have captured Freedom’s base! The anarchists have been defeated and will no longer bother us in our fight against the Zone. Congratulations to all those who contributed to this momentous victory!
Our forces in the Dark Valley were overrun and pushed back to the Garbage. We need a foothold in the Dark Valley to attack Freedom’s base!
Attention all units! Recon reports that a large group of Freedom fighters has captured the base and now controls the Dark Valley. It’s time to put them back in their place.
